name: portfolio-project
description: This is a website for the fictional theme park from the film Jurassic Park.

scripts.build-test: npm run clean && npm run setup && npm run usemin-mainfolder && npm run copyfonts && npm run copyimages && npm run copy-html-folders
scripts.copyimages: copyfiles Jurassic_Park_logo_no_words.ico dist && copyfiles img/** dist
scripts.copy-html-folders: copyfiles park-info/** dist && copyfiles things-to-do/** dist && copyfiles things-to-see/** dist && copyfiles tickets/** dist
scripts.usemin-mainfolder: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin privacy-policy.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/privacy-policy.html

author: Sean Mussack
